content.text: Match ends, Granada CF 2, Sporting de Gijón 1.
Second Half ends, Granada CF 2, Sporting de Gijón 1.
Carlos Martins (Granada CF) is shown the red card.
Dani Benítez (Granada CF) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Alberto Botía (Sporting de Gijón).
Goal!  Granada CF 2, Sporting de Gijón 1. Adrián Colunga (Sporting de Gijón) right footed shot from outside the box to the top left corner. Assisted by Nacho Cases.
Offside, Granada CF. Mikel Rico tries a through ball, but Odion Ighalo is caught offside.
Substitution, Granada CF. Manuel Lucena replaces Franco Jara.
Offside, Sporting de Gijón. Nacho Cases tries a through ball, but Carmelo is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Mikel Rico (Granada CF) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses the top left corner. Assisted by Dani Benítez.
Attempt missed. Franco Jara (Granada CF) header from a difficult angle on the right is just a bit too high. Assisted by Dani Benítez with a cross following a fast break.
Allan Nyom (Granada CF) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
